wikipedia_page.main: Andrew McCall (15 March 1925 – December 2014) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger, making over 300 appearances in the Football League.

link_mentions.page: List of English association football families

response: * Andy McCall, Stuart McCall (son), Craig McCall (grandson - son of Stuart)
Craig is the son of former Everton, Rangers, Bradford City, Sheffield United and Scotland international Stuart McCall; his grandfather Andy McCall was also a professional footballer.
